channel.title: notes on Shengli's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in notes on Shengli's Blog

item.description: 常用git指令 显示commit日志. git log –oneline –abbrev-commit –all –graph Commands that affect local branch references include commit merge rebase reset. Commands that affect remote branch references include fetch push. pull command is special case, it combines fetch and either merge or rebase. 一个小的修改不想增加新的commit，可以使用 git commit –amend . git gc 将遍历所有的branch和tag，删除掉不能达到的commit. git config –get name 显示配置信息. git branch –all 显示本地分支和远端分支。 git remote 列出所有的远程主机名.
